content: मुक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [मुच्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Release, liberation, deliverance. {@--2@} Freedom, emancipation. {@--3@} Final beatitude or emancipation, absolution of the soul from metempsychosis; अधिगत्य जगत्यधीश्वरादय मुक्तिं पुरुषोत्तमात्ततः <ls>N. 2. 1</ls> (where पुक्ति has sense {1} also). {@--4@} Leaving, giving up, abandoning, avoiding; संसर्गमुक्तिः खलेषु <ls>Bh. 2. 62.</ls> {@--5@} Throwing, hurling, letting off, discharging. {@--6@} Unloosing, opening. {@--7@} Discharge. paying off (as a debt).
